short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Randomly browse Wikipedia pages from the 5.2 million English Wikipedia entries, in each new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View random Wikipedia pages every time you open a new Chrome tab. Quickly navigate through random listings from the millions of English Wikipedia entries. A web-based experience is available at http://wikiroulette.co and full source code is available on Github (https://github.com/minouye/wikiroulette).
